itemInfo.itemDesc: A seed used to obtain Hot Peppers, a Cooking ingredient, by Farming. You can begin Farming after using a Fence to create a Garden. This produce takes up 2 spaces in a Garden and yields more produce than a single-space crop. Plant Breeding will succeed at a higher rate using this crop.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Thickets and Bushes using Bare Hands or a Hoe.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)
